string.comment: Title for a screen; please keep short. Device here means a phone.
string.name: twofa_new_device_verification_title

string.comment: Please keep 'authentication app' consistent with other uses.
string.name: twofa_new_device_otp_verification_explanation

resources.string: We noticed that you\'re logging in from a new device. Please enter the verification code generated by your authentication app to log in.

string.comment: The phone number is shown in the first sentence
string.name: twofa_new_device_sms_verification_explanation

resources.string: We\'ve noticed you\'re logging in on a new device, so we\'ve sent a text message with a code to your phone number %1$s. Please enter it below to verify your identity.

string.comment: Title for a screen; please keep short.
string.name: two_fa_settings_title

string.comment: Notice message.
string.name: two_fa_disabled_phone_verification_info

resources.string: Please verify a phone number before using login verification.
Login verification helps keep your account more secure.\n\nWith login verification enabled, you will need both your password and a verification code sent to your phone to log in on new devices.
With login verification enabled, you will need both your password and a verification code to log in on new devices.
A code will be sent to %1$s.
If you disable text verification, only your password will be required to log in to Snapchat on new devices.
If you disable text verification, you will still need both your password and a verification code from your authentication app to log in on new devices.
Generate a code on your device using an app such as Google Authenticator.
If you disable your authentication app, only your password will be required to log in to Snapchat on new devices.
If you disable your authentication app, you will still need both your password and a verification code sent to your phone number to log in on new devices.
Generate a recovery code so that you can log in on new devices if you change or lose access to your phone number.
Generate a recovery code so that you can log in on new devices if you lose your device or delete your authentication app.
Generate a recovery code so that you can log in on new devices if you lose access to your phone number and your authentication app.
Please choose how you want to receive your verification code.
A code will be sent to %1$s.
Generate a code on your device using an app such as Google Authenticator.
You will now be taken to your authentication app. Please copy or write down the code from there and return to Snapchat.
Try setting up your authentication app manually, or tap \"Find an app\" if you still need to download an authentication app.
Text verification is simplest, but if you\'re travelling abroad without access to your phone number, or you\'re using Snapchat on a tablet or other device, an authentication app is a good solution.
Choose this option if you already have an authentication app installed.
Choose this option to set up an authentication app manually (for example, if it\'s installed on another device).
See the authentication apps we recommend.
For manual setup, please enter this code in your authentication app.
We\'ve sent a code to %1$s. Please enter it below.
If this isn\'t your number, you can change it.

string.comment: Button title
string.name: two_fa_allow_remember_device

resources.string: Please enter the code generated by your authentication app.

resources.string: When you disable login verification, we\'ll only check your password when you log in on new devices.

Failed to send - Tap to try again
Would you like to replay this Snap from %1$s? Using your Replay allows you to view a Snap one more time after it expires. It\'s a big compliment! %2$s

Thanks for your interest in Paid Replays!

Here are a few things to know about in-app purchases on Snapchat:

First, when you buy in-app purchases like Paid Replays on Snapchat, you won’t actually own these products. Instead, you’re buying a limited revocable license to use them. That means you can use the products, but you don’t own the technology behind them, and if we choose to discontinue any of them down the road, you won’t be able to use them anymore.

We’ll show current pricing for in-app purchases before you complete a purchase. All sales are final, and because we provide you with immediate access to your purchase once you click "Buy", you waive any right you may have under local law to cancel your purchase once it’s completed or to obtain a refund.

Please note that if we suspend or terminate your account in accordance with Snapchat’s Terms of Service you’ll lose any products or services you purchased for use within Snapchat. It’s your responsibility to manage your in-app purchases. For information about how to restrict in-app purchases on your device please consult your app store’s terms. If you are under 18, you must obtain your parent’s or guardian’s consent before making in-app purchases.
You can replay any Snap once %1$s Watch your Replay immediately, or it will disappear!
You can replay any Snap once %1$s Your previously purchased Replays let you replay a Snap a second time. Watch your Replay immediately, or it will disappear!
You can use Replays you previously purchased to replay a Snap one extra time.\n\nYou have 1 extra Replay remaining.
You can use Replays you previously purchased to replay a Snap one extra time.\n\nYou have %1$d extra Replays remaining.

string.comment: TOS/PP HTML description including a bulleted list
string.name: tos_pp_description_update_5

resources.string:
Please read both to make sure you understand the changes that may be important to you! To get you started, here are a few of the changes you\'ll find:

  • We’ve noted in our Privacy Policy a few reasons why we might use your information to communicate with you, such as for support enquiries or about our products.
  • If you live outside the US, you’ll now be agreeing to Terms of Service with Snap Group Limited. This shouldn’t affect your experience in the app, but helps as we grow our business around the world!
  • These Terms look a lot like the US Terms, but you’ll find some differences about how disagreements between us will be worked out.
Tap to view the full story
Tap to view this video in Discover

resources.string: Save to My Eyes Only by Default
When you save a Snap or Story, it will be directly saved in My Eyes Only.
When you save a Snap or Story, where should it be saved?
When enabled, Snaps you save to Memories will also save to your camera roll.
When you save a Snap or Story, it will be saved in both Memories and your camera roll.
When you save a Snap or Story, it will not be saved in Memories.
Saving to Memories instead of Camera Roll can save space on your phone.
Move Snaps to My Eyes Only so they\'re out of the way when you\'re showing Memories to your friends.
This passcode is the only way to access My Eyes Only.
I understand that if I forget this passcode, Snapchat won\'t be able to recover my passcode or my Snaps in My Eyes Only.
This mode uses a stronger password. If you forget it, Snapchat won\'t be able to recover it or your private Snaps for you.
Your passphrase must be at least 16 characters long, and contain at least 1 letter and 1 number.
This passphrase is the only way to access My Eyes Only.
I understand that if I forget this passphrase, Snapchat won\'t be able to recover my passphrase or my private Snaps for me.
If you forget your passphrase, you can no longer access My Eyes Only.\n\n If you create a new passphrase, you will lose everything currently saved in My Eyes Only.
I understand that creating a new passphrase will delete all Snaps in My Eyes Only.
If you forget your passcode, you can no longer access My Eyes Only.\n\n If you create a new passcode, you will lose everything currently saved in My Eyes Only.
I understand that creating a new passcode will delete all Snaps in My Eyes Only.
You have no Snaps in My Eyes Only.
You\'ll be prompted to create a new 4-digit passcode instead.
Please enter your passcode again first.
Please enter your passphrase again first.
Move Snaps to My Eyes Only?
If you forget your passcode, Snapchat won\'t be able to recover it or your private Snaps for you.

Adverts on Snapchat appear in various places, such as Discover, Lenses and Stories. Adverts may be customised for you based on your activity in the app (such as which content you watch), profile details (such as your birthday), information from our advertising partners and other means. We’ve created our advertising products to be fun and engaging – we hope you like them!

Snap Audience Match customises the adverts you see based on information from our advertising partners. For example, if you subscribe to your favourite artist\'s email list, they may ask us to show you an advert for their latest album. If you turn off this feature, you’ll still see adverts based on your identity details and activity on Snapchat, but not based on information from advertising partners.
You will still see adverts if you disable this feature, but the adverts may be less relevant to your interests.
Custom stickers saved by %1$s didn\'t finish backing up. If you sign up for a new account, those stickers will be lost. Log back in as %1$s to finish the backup
Keep looking straight at the Snapcode!
Try holding your phone about 12 inches away from your face to pair.
Your Specs are already paired. You\'re good to go!
Pairing with these Specs will unpair the ones you\'ve already set up.
Please turn Bluetooth back on and try pairing with Specs again.
Please turn Wi-Fi back on and try pairing with Specs again.
It looks like you\'re having trouble. Let\'s try another way to pair.
Try pairing Spectacles indoors and away from screen glare. Also, hold your phone about 12 inches away from your face (while wearing Specs).
Something went wrong. Please try pairing with Specs again.
Please try again, and be sure to follow the instructions as they appear on screen.
Look at the Snapcode and press the button on Spectacles once to pair.
Are you sure you want to stop pairing with Spectacles?
Press and hold the button on Specs for 7 seconds.
Press the button on Specs once to continue.
Please keep your Specs close by!

Specs encountered a serious error and need to reset. This takes a few minutes and will erase all content on your Specs %1$s Once Specs have finished resetting, you can re-pair them with your device. Sorry about that!
This is how your Spectacles appear in Bluetooth and Wi-Fi settings.
By tapping \"OK\", you agree to the %1$s.
Charge your Specs to at least 70%, then try updating again. You can check your battery level in Settings.
Updating Specs might take a few minutes. During this time, you won\'t be able to take any Snaps with them. Would you like to update now?
Your Specs need to update before you can import Snaps. This might take a few minutes!
There was an issue updating your Specs. Please try again.
Specs encountered an error while trying to update. Please try again.
This clears any Snaps currently stored on your Specs. This won\'t delete Snaps you\'ve already imported to Memories.
Something went wrong when trying to clear Spectacles content. Please try again.
Your Specs will restart and automatically reconnect to your device after several seconds. Restarting won\'t delete any Snaps stored on your Specs.
This will un-pair Spectacles from your device. If you want to use these Specs again, you\'ll have to re-pair them.
Your Specs will restart and automatically reconnect to your device after several seconds. Restarting won\'t delete any Snaps stored on your Specs.
This will turn on Bluetooth to begin pairing
Look at your Snapcode and press the button on your Spectacles once to pair!
"You've already named a pair of Spectacles%1$s. Choose another name so things don't get confusing!"
The name you choose must be at least 4 characters long.
Spectacles are sunglasses that take Snaps! Learn more about Spectacles here.
You haven\'t imported anything from your Spectacles yet!
Sorry! You can\'t move Highlight Stories to My Eyes Only.
Memories can\'t import any more Snaps from Specs because your device\'s storage is full. To free up space, try deleting unused apps, music or photos.
This may take a few minutes! During this time, you won\'t be able to take any Snaps with Specs.
The battery in your Specs is low. Plug in Specs to continue importing Snaps to Memories.
The Wi-Fi connection with Specs was lost. To continue importing Snaps, make sure Specs are close to your device. If Spectacles still won\'t connect, try connecting again in Snapchat Settings.
The connection with Specs was lost. To continue importing, make sure Specs are close to your device and not out of battery.

Specs encountered a serious error and need to reset. This takes a few minutes and will erase all content on your Specs %1$s Once Specs have finished resetting, you can re-pair them with your device. Sorry about that!
Something went wrong importing Snaps from Specs. Please try again!
This will also delete the Story\'s Highlights %1$s
Snaps you remove from Highlights are still part of the day\'s Story.
Press once to take a 10-second video Snap!
Press again to extend by 10 seconds, or press and hold to stop recording.
Double-tap the side to check your battery level.
If you\'re running low, put Spectacles in their charging case for a bit.
Specs light up when they\'re charging!
The charging case holds about 4 full charges.
You have Save to My Eyes Only by Default enabled in Settings. Snaps you take with Specs won\'t be automatically moved to My Eyes Only, but you can always move them there yourself!
Shake your device to report a technical problem with Snapchat or suggest an improvement!
Shake your device to report a technical problem with Snapchat or suggest an improvement! You can customise Shake sensitivity in Settings.\n\nNote: we may not review every Shake we receive.
Thanks for using Shake To Report! Please provide feedback in the text box. You can also draw on the captured screenshot.\n\n You can turn off Shake To Report or change shake sensitivity in Settings.
What went wrong? Please describe in detail.
This uses the name you added to your Snapchat account.
This uses the email address you added to your Snapchat account.
This uses the phone number you added to your Snapchat account.
This uses the name and phone number you added to your Snapchat account.
This uses the email address and phone number you added to your Snapchat account.
"This uses the name and email address you added to your Snapchat account."
"This uses the email, name and phone number you added to your Snapchat account."
This website is trying to open another app.
Press and hold on the camera screen to Shazam a song!
Press and hold on the camera screen to Shazam a song! Songs you\'ve Shazamed appear here.
This website is trying to open another app.

"Dear Nexus 4 user,\n\nRecently, you may have experienced device restarts while using Snapchat. Unfortunately, this behaviour is caused by a bug in the Nexus 4 Android operating system and is out of Snapchat's control. If you would like to let Google know that this issue is important to you, please visit Nexus 4 support. Thank you for your patience."
Please take a few minutes to review our Community Guidelines and refrain from this kind of behaviour in the future, or your account may be suspended or deleted. Thanks for your cooperation.
